member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D
member.summary: Data object for a 2-dimensional vector.

member.name: F:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.Up
member.summary: A vector with the points [0 1].

member.name: F:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.Down
member.summary: A vector with the points [0 -1].

member.summary: A vector with the points [-1 0].

member.name: F:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.Right
member.summary: A vector with the points [1 0].

member.name: F:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.Zero
member.summary: A vector with the points [0 0].

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.X
member.summary: The x-axis point of the vector.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.Y
member.summary: The y-axis point of the vector

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.DataObjects.Vector2D.Equals(System.Object)
member.param: The Vector2D object to compare against this one.
member.returns: true if the X and Y properties of this object match the X and Y properties of the compared Vector2D.

member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DirectoryHelper
member.summary: Provides methods for reading files into memory.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DirectoryHelper.NormalizePath(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the directory delimiters depending on the underlying platform type. If the platform is a server then all '\' are replaced with '/', otherwise all '/' are replaced with '\'.
member.param: The relative or absolute file path to correct.
member.returns: The same file path given as an argument but formatted correctly based on the platform.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DirectoryHelper.GetUserFolder
member.summary: Returns the directory path to the control systems User folder. string does not include the trailing '/'.
member.returns: the application directory with '/User' or 'user' appended.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DirectoryHelper.FileExists(System.String)
member.summary: Check to see if a given file exists on the control system.
member.param: The full filepath to check, including file extension.
member.returns: true of the file exists, false otherwise.

member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader
member.summary: Helper class used to load a Crestron Certified Driver from a DLL using reflection.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.LoadDriverInstance``1(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return an instance of a Crestron Certified Driver.
member.param: The full directory and file name with extension of the target assembly.
The CCD interface to search for in the driver dll.
The CCD transport type to search for in the driver dll.
member.returns: The target T object, if found in the assembly, or T default if no matching driver is found.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.LoadClassByInterface``1(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Return an instance of a class based on the defined interface name.
member.param: The full directory and file name with extension of the target assembly.
The class to search for in the assembly dll.
The interface to search for in the assembly dll.
member.returns: The target T object, if found in the assembly, or T default if no matching driver is found.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetTransportType(System.String)
member.summary: Resolved a configuration service tag to a Crestron Certified Driver transport interface type. Writes an error to the logging system if the lookup fails.
member.param: The tag to evaluate. Cannot be null or empty.
member.returns: The name of the CCD transport type, or the empty string if the give tag is not supported.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetBaudRate(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a configuration baud rate argument to a CCD baud rate value. Writes a warning to the logging system if an unrecognized value is encountered.
member.param: The config-defined baud rate to convert.
member.returns: the CCD baud rate value. Defaults to 9600 if unable to parse baudRate.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetDataBits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a configuration data bits number to a CCD data bits definition. Writes an error to the logging system if an unrecognized argument is given.
member.param: The data bits number set in the configuration.
member.returns: The CCD data bits equivalent to 'data', or NotSpecified if unable to parse.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetStopBits(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert a configuration data bits number to a CCD stop bits definition. Writes an error to the logging system if an unrecognized argument is given.
member.param: The stop bits number set in the configuration.
member.returns: The CCD stop bits equivalent to 'data', or NotSpecified if unable to parse.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetHwHandshake(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a configuration Hardware Handshake argument to a CCD hardware handshake definition. Writes an error to the logging system if an unrecognized argument is given.
member.param: The Hardware Handshake argument set in the configuration.
member.returns: The CCD Hardware Handshake equivalent to 'data', or NotSpecified if unable to parse.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetSwHandshake(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a configuration Software Handshake argument to a CCD software handshake definition. Writes an error to the logging system if an unrecognized argument is given.
member.param: The Software Handshake argument set in the configuration.
member.returns: The CCD Software Handshake equivalent to 'data', or NotSpecified if unable to parse.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetParity(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a configuration parity argument to a CCD parity definition. Writes an error to the logging system if an unrecognized argument is given.
member.param: The parity argument set in the configuration.
member.returns: The CCD parity equivalent to 'data', or NotSpecified if unable to parse.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.FileOps.DriverLoader.GetProtocol(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a configuration serial protocol argument to a CCD protocol definition. Writes an error to the logging system if an unrecognized argument is given.
member.param: The serial protocol argument set in the configuration.
member.returns: The CCD serial protocol equivalent to 'data', or NotSpecified if unable to parse.

member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.Logging.CrestronTextWriter
member.summary: Class for setting Console.Write() and Console.WriteLine() behavior.

member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger
member.summary: Logging system for writing messages to the control system error long and console output.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.SetProgramId(System.String)
member.summary: Set the ID tag that is included in all log statements.
member.param: A program unique ID used to identify what program slot is writing to the log.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.SetDebugOn
member.summary: Enables additional log statements for debugging purposes. Should only be used when debugging an issue and disabled when done.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.SetDebugOff
member.summary: Disables the additional logging statements if debug mode is active.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Info(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a basic information statement to the logging system, Usually to non-permanent logs (CLI). Does nothing if 'message' is null or empty.
member.param: The statement to write to the logging system.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Info(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes a basic information statement to the logging system, Usually to non-permanent logs (CLI). Does nothing if 'message' is null or empty.
member.param: string format for the statement to write to the logging system.
string formatting arguments

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Writes an error to the logging system, both permanent and non-permanent logs.
member.param: The message to record in the logging system.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Error(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes a formatted string to the error logging system.
member.param: The formatted string that will be logged
all string format parameters.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Error(System.Exception,System.String)
member.summary: Write an exception stack trace to the logging system.
member.param: the .NET exception that will be logged to the system.
The custom message to include with the exception log.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Error(System.Exception,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Write an exception stack trace to the logging system.
member.param: The .NET exception that will be logged to the system.
The formatted string to include with the error log.
parameters for the formatted message.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Write a warning message to the logging system.
member.param: The message to write to the logs.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Warn(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Write a warning message to the logging system as a formatted string.
member.param: The string format to use when writing to the log.
parameters to include in the formatted string.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Debug(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Write a debug message to the logging system. This will only display if debug mode is enabled.
member.param: The string format to use when writing to the log.
parameters for the formatted string.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.Logging.Logger.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: Write a debug message to the logging system. This will only display if debug mode is enabled.
member.param: The message to write to the debug log.

member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient
member.summary: Utility class for checking remote SFTP servers and downloading files. Uses either Username/password or SSH keys for connection.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of using a username and password for SFTP connection.
member.param: The IP address or hostname of the SFTP server.
The username used to log into the SFTP server.
The password used to log into the SFTP server.
member.exception: If any argument is null or empty.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Renci.SshNet.PrivateKeyFile)
member.summary: Creates an instance of using a username and SSH key for SFTP connection.
member.param: The IP address or hostname of the SFTP server.
The username used to log into the SFTP server.
The private key used to authenticate with the server.
member.exception: If any argument is null or empty.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.FileQueryComplete
member.summary: Triggered when a response is received from the server after calling QueryFileNames() successfully. Response data will be stored in the FileNamesReceived property.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.ErrorOccurred
member.summary: Triggered whenever there is an error querying, downloading, or connected to the the SFTP server. Error information will be stored in the LastErrorMessage property.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.DownloadComplete
member.summary: Triggered when a file download from the remote server has completed successfully.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.LastErrorMessage
member.summary: Error information on the last error event.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.FilesNamesReceived
member.summary: A collection of file names (including extension) that were in the directory provided in the most recent call to QueryFileNames(). This will be empty if there are no files or QueryFileName() has not been called.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there is an active connection with the remote server.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.Connect
member.summary: Attempts to connect to the remote SFTP server. Does nothing if the client is already connected.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Attempts to disconnect from the remote server. Does nothing if there is no active client connection.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.QueryFileNames(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the remote server for the names and extensions of all files in the target directory. This will not store any responses that are subdirectories. Only file names are saved. Does nothing if there is no active connection.
member.param: The full directory path on the remote server.
member.exception: If any argument is null or the empty string.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicFtpClient.DownloadFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the given file from the remote server to the provided local directory and file name. Does nothing if there is not an active connection with the remote server.
member.param: The full path to the file that will be downloaded, including file extension.
The full path to the local file that will be saved, including file extension.
member.exception: If any argument is null or the empty string.

member.name: T:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient
member.summary: Simple TCP/IP client for ethernet communications.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This class does not check hostname formatting.
member.param: The IP Address or hostname to connect with. Defaults to 'localhost'
The port number used to connect. Value = 0 - 65535, defaults to 80.
The size of the read/write stream buffer. Defaults to 5000.
member.exception: if port is outside the range of 0-65535 or if bufferSize is less than 0.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.ConnectionFailed
member.summary: Triggered each time a connection attempt fails. Data package contains the SocketStatus enum for the failure.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.ClientConnected
member.summary: Triggered on a successful connection with the host.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.StatusChanged
member.summary: Triggered whenever the connection status changes. Current status can be obtained from the ClientStatusMessage property.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.RxReceived
member.summary: Triggered whenever any data is received from the server. Arguments packages has the string data. Subscribe to this event if string data is desired rather than the raw bytes.

member.name: E:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.RxBytesReceived
member.summary: Triggered whenever any data is received from the server. Subscribe to this event the raw byte data is desired rather than string data.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Hostname
member.summary: The hostname or IP address set at object creation.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.RxData
member.summary: Gets the last set of data sent by the server.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.RxBytes
member.summary: Gets the most recent response from the server as an array of bytes.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.ClientStatusMessage
member.summary: Gets the current connection status. .

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Port
member.summary: Gets the port number being used for connection.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.BufferSize
member.summary: Gets the current buffer size used when sending or receiving responses from the server. This is set at object creation.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Connected
member.summary: Gets the current connection status. True = client reports connected, false = client reports disconnected.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.EnableReconnect
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the client should auto-attempt a reconnect at the ReconnectTime interval.

member.name: P:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.ReconnectTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time between reconnect attempts, in Milliseconds.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Connect
member.summary: Attempt to connect to the server. This will disconnect a currently active connection.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnect from the server if currently connected. Does nothing if there is no active connection.

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Send a string of information to the server. Length is limited by the value of BufferSize. No action is taken if 'data' is null.
member.param: The string data to send to the server. Cannot be null

member.name: M:pkd_common_utils.NetComs.BasicTcpClient.Send(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Send a command to the server as a byte array.
member.param: The byte data to send to the server.
